original_text: For there were that said, We, our sons, and our daughters, are many: therefore we take up corn for them, that we may eat, and live.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 말하기를 우리와 우리 자녀가 많으니 양식을 얻어 먹고 살아야 하겠다 하고

sentences.original_text: We, our sons, and our daughters, are many
therefore we take up corn for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 그들을 위해 곡물을 구합니다

sentences.original_text: that we may eat, and live
